name: iHaggle: Hidden Treasure Street
description:
Big hidden object game challenge! Find 1,000 objects in 19 photo realistic shops & houses. Travel on a virtual street with hours of casual replay value. Will you be the one to find them all ?

Now with new higher resolution graphics and pictures for iPad and iPhone.

Pickers and Pawn Stars will love iHaggle's find and sell twist.

Move up and down a virtual street by sliding your finger, then tap to go inside the shops and houses, searching for treasures on your list. Some are easy to find, and others are carefully hidden, making iHaggle fun for beginners to advanced hidden object game players.

When you've found all the items on your list, head to the Appraisal Shop and sell them for the best price. Make enough money, and advance to the next level.

Latest update adds another new shop, "The Side Show" to Haggle Street.

For higher scores, play the optional Hi-Lo Challenge mini game in between each level.

With each new level, new shops and houses open up for you to explore until you've unlocked all 19. If you repeat a level, a new search list is created until all items have been used once so you're looking for different items each time. With 1,000 items, that's a lot of repeat play value !

Shops/Houses:
Appraisal Shop
Nick’s Nac Shack
Handy Depot
George’s Curios
Bahama Momma & Pops
Sweaty Pete’s
#6 Haggle Street (Garage Sale)
#7 Haggle Street (Garage Sale)
Grandma’s Drawers
Holley Humbugs
Dusty & Krusty Antiques
Digbees
Costmore
JC Puney
Wee Mart
Bullseye
Barns & Hammers
Museum of Natural History
The Duller Image
The Side Show
